Package javax.activity.propertygroup

Interface Summary
PropertyGroup A PropertyGroup is used to provide distributed context, scoped to an Activity, that may be set by an application or a high-level service (HLS) built on top of the Activity service.
PropertyGroupManager A PropertyGroupManager is an entity that is be provided, as part of a High Level Service (HLS) ServiceManager implementation, together with any PropertyGroups used by the HLS.
